DOC.brief_title: Food Effect Study Of AG-013736 In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) clinical laboratory test ) . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . An informed consent document sign date subject legally acceptable representative . Evidence history clinically significant blood , kidney , endocrine , gastrointestinal , heart , liver , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) disease clinical finding Screening . Active smoker user tobacco product well user certain drug . Pregnant nursing female ; female childbearing potential , include tubal ligation . To consider enrollment , woman 45 55 year age postmenopausal ( define amenorrheic least 2 year ) must confirmatory Folliclestimulating hormone ( FSH ) test result Screening .
